metadata.title: USN-4164-1 -- Libxslt vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Libxslt incorrectly handled certain documents. An attacker could possibly use this issue to access sensitive information. This issue not affected Ubuntu 19.10. (CVE-2019-13117, CVE-2019-13118)  It was discovered that Libxslt incorrectly handled certain documents. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2019-18197)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4164-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-libxslt1 - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1 libxslt1-dev - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1 libxslt1.1 - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1 xsltproc - 1.1.28-2ubuntu0.2+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
